steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Illustrations' group, click on the 'Shapes' button.
From the drop-down menu, select the 'Line' shape.
Click and drag on the document to draw a line.
Release the mouse button to finalize the line.
Adjust the line properties, such as color, thickness, and style, using the options in the 'Format' tab.
Save the changes to the document.
